title: France panorama. [No. 67/18]
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Gardens - France
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Botanical gardens
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cannes Film Festival
description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The Cannes Festival - opening of the Cannes Film Festival showing glimpses of celebrities including Gina Lollobrigida, Annie Girardot, Yves Montand, Geraldine Chaplin, Claude Lelouch. 2. Art in the raw and therapy art: An exhibition at the Musee des Art Decoraties of "L'Art Brut". St Anne's Hospital for the mentally ill has introduced art sessions for its patients. 3. Chantiers Sous-Marins - focuses on the training of professional skin-divers. 4. A stroll in the past - presents one of Paris' 60 villages. 5. France's most spectacular historical gardens.
